r.s: A test runner for Test Driven Development
r.d: Stagehand_TestRunner provides a test runner to run unit tests. Stagehand_TestRunner strongly supports Test Driven Development by various features.
r.n:
What's New in Stagehand_TestRunner 2.15.0 Supports URL-encoded class and method names. (Issue #247)
The --classes and -m options can now accept URL-encoded string. This feature is intended to be used for the class and method names which contain multibyte characters.
A Defect Fix
The following defect has been fixed:
* No tests found when specifying the fully qualified class name with a namespace. (Issue #245)
